fields.infoText:
To find out more about passengers and aircraft that are chargeable or exempt from Air Passenger Duty follow the steps below.

1. Open a new window or tab.
2. Go to GOV.UK.
3. Search for 'Air Passenger Duty for plane operators'.

Where can I find out how to calculate Air Passenger Duty?
fields.infoText:
To find out how to calculate Air Passenger Duty and the current rates, follow the steps below.

1. Open a new tab or window.
2. Go to GOV.UK.
3. Search for 'Rates for Air Passenger Duty'.

By submitting this registration you confirm that the information you have provided is true and complete. 

If you do not give complete and accurate information, HMRC may charge a financial penalty or even prosecute you.
This is your last opportunity to print or save a pdf copy of your submitted form.

HMRC will send you a letter to confirm your registration details and return dates so that you can prepare your first Air Passenger Duty return. 

If you are a plane operator based outside the UK, you must appoint a UK based agent or representative. For details of how to do this, go to the [guidance page](https://www.gov.uk/guidance/air-passenger-duty-for-plane-operators) for Air Passenger Duty on GOV.UK

If you operate direct long haul flights from Northern Ireland, you need to contact the Central Assurance Team on APDHelpdesk@hmrc.gov.uk
